sentence.Network_en: Remarriage would revoke all previous wills.
sentence.Network_cn: 再婚会使原有的一切遗嘱失效.

sentence.Network_en: The university may revoke my diploma.
sentence.Network_cn: 大学可能吊销我的毕业证书.

sentence.Network_en: We hereby revoke the agreement of January 1 st 1982.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们特此宣告1982年1月1日的协议无效.

list.abs: The ability to enact and revoke laws depends on the ruler in monarchies republics ., 如果是君主政体 , 制定和废除法律的能力决定于王国的统治者;
图文2011年7月21日 - 深圳的Urban Management Bureau(城管局)称,报刊亭将禁止出售饮料和食品,如果违反规定将revoke license(吊销营业执照)。 相关阅读 “治安高危人群”英文.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French revoquer or Latin revocare, from re- 'back' + vocare 'to call'

encyclopedia.content: REVOKE 名称：REVOKE — 废除某用户或某组或所有用户访问权限． REVOKE privilege [, ...] ON object [, ...] FROM { PUBLIC | GROUP ER">gBLE> | username } 输入 privilege 可能的权限是 SELECT 对选定表/视图的所有列/字段的访问权限． INSERT 对选定表的所有列/字段的插入数据的权限． UPDATE 对选定表所有列/字段的更新权限． DELETE 对选定表所有列/字段的删除权限． RULE 在表/视图上定义规则的权限．（参阅 CR

entry.tran: 取消，废除，撤销（许可、法律、协议等）
entry.def: When people in authority revoke something such as a licence, a law, or an agreement, they cancel it.

example.ex: The government revoked her husband's license to operate migrant labor crews.
example.tran: 政府撤销了她丈夫管理外来打工人群的许可证。

means.word_mean: 1. the mistake of not following suit when able to do so
1. fail to follow suit when able and required to do so

auth_sentence.content: But a two-thirds legislative vote can revoke the safeguard.
auth_sentence.res_content: But a two-thirds legislative vote can revoke the safeguard.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But a two-thirds legislative vote can revoke the safeguard.

auth_sentence.content: "You issue licences and then you revoke them," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "You issue licences and then you revoke them," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "You issue licences and then you revoke them," he said.

auth_sentence.content: My decision to forgo the exercise of active ministry does not revoke this.
auth_sentence.res_content: My decision to forgo the exercise of active ministry does not revoke this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My decision to forgo the exercise of active ministry does not revoke this.

stems_affixes.word_buile: invoc=invoke[v.祈求,恳求,[法律的]实施生效]+atory表形容词→adj.祈求的, 祈愿的
revoc=revoke[v.废除,取消]+able能……的→adj.可废除的
equi平等+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→有两种声音→双关语
con共同+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→喊到一起→召集
e出+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→喊出思想等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 祈求,恳求,[法律的]实施生效
stems_affixes.word_buile: in进+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→喊进去,请求
pro前+vok喊+e→在[你]前面喊→激怒[你]
re回+vok出声,叫喊,看+e→喊回来,取消
